articles.title: Kanji Inoki Pays Tributes to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kanji Inoki Pays Tributes to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councillors of Japan, and his party visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 They laid a bouquet before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Kanji Inoki Here
articles.content:
Kanji Inoki Here
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councillors of Japan, and his party arrived here by air on Monday.

articles.title: Kimilsungia Awarded Special Prize at Int'l Expo in China
articles.content:
Kimilsungia Awarded Special Prize at Int'l Expo in China
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Kimilsungia, flower of the sun, was awarded the special prize at the 8th China (Sanya) International Orchid Expo.
					 The expo opened on January 8. More than 30 000 potted orchids were presented to the expo from at least 120 units of the DPRK, Indonesia, Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, Germany, France and other countries and various parts of China.
					
					 The wing of the DPRK was crowded with horticulturists and visitors fascinated by Kimilsungia. 
					
					 A prize-awarding ceremony took place in Sanya City, Hainan Province of China that day. 
					
					 The certificate of the special prize awarded to Kimilsungia was conveyed to the head of the delegation of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee at the ceremony. 
					
					 The executive director of the Orchid Association of China sincerely congratulated the DPRK on world famous flower Kimilsungia named after President Kim Il Sung receiving the special prize.
					
					 The expo will become more conspicuous and popular as beautiful, elegant and delicate Kimilsungia is exhibited, he said. 
					
					 The vice mayor of Sanya City and the honorary chairman of the Orchid Association of Hainan Province said that they are pleased that the DPRK took part in the expo for the first time and peculiarly exhibited the famous flower named after Kim Il Sung. Kimilsungia is very beautiful and fascinating, they added. 
					
					 A delegate of the Singaporean Orchid Association said: Kimilsungia well known in the world is drawing great attention from the visitors. The flower is very beautiful and elegant. 
					
					 The expo goes on till January 14.

articles.title: More Meetings Vow to Carry Out Tasks Set Forth in New Year Address
articles.content:
More Meetings Vow to Carry Out Tasks Set Forth in New Year Address
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers and employees of institutions, factories and enterprises across the country held meetings to vow to carry out the important tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 At the meetings oath-taking speeches followed reports.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said that Kim Jong Un's historic New Year Address instills the conviction of the bright future of the DPRK and revolutionary self-esteem into all service personnel and people and indicates a shortcut to making new leaping progress and innovations.
					
					 They expressed determination to boost the agricultural production, bearing in mind the policy of the party on keeping up agriculture as a major thrust of the on-going drive.
					
					 They called for improving animal husbandry and doing greenhouse vegetable and mushroom farming on an extensive scale so as to ensure that larger quantities of meat, vegetables and mushrooms are supplied to the people.
					
					 They mentioned the need to complete the reclamation on Honggon Island by concentrating all forces and means on the project and making the maximum use of vehicles and compressing equipment.
					
					 They said they would definitely put the economy on a modern and CNC basis, make it intensive in terms of science and technology and open a short-cut to the era of intellectual-based economy by directing efforts to developing ultra-modern science and technologies and intensifying researches into basic science.

articles.title: Coal Output on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Coal Output on Increase in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Coal output is on the increase in the DPRK. 
					 According to data available at the Ministry of Coal Industry, coal mines across the country have overfulfilled their quota at 123 percent on a daily average as of January 10.
					
					 By applying advanced methods of blasting, the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine and Chonsong Youth Coal Mine under the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex have carried out daily tunneling quota at above 100 percent. 
					
					 Jenam, Namyang and other coal mines under the Tokchon Area Coal Mining Complex have overfulfilled daily assignments at 124 percent.
					
					 The Inpho Coal Mine has put the production on a steady increase by operating cableway at full capacity.
					
					 Production upsurge has also been made at collieries under the Anju Area and Kujang Area coal mining complexes.
					
					 Ri Yong Yong, vice-minister of Coal Industry, told KCNA that the ministry has set higher target of coal output this year.
					
					 All officials of the ministry have found themselves among coal miners to inspire them to carry out the tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address, he said, adding:
					
					 A great importance has been attached to the supply of machinery and materials to collieries in the western part of the country, which have large deposits with favorable mining conditions.

articles.title: Assistance to Farms Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Assistance to Farms Brisk in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- A brisk campaign for assistance to the countryside is going on in the DPRK in hearty response to supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address, which called for keeping up agriculture as a major thrust of this year's struggle and concentrating all efforts on farming.
					 Pyongyang City recently provided more than 10,000 tonnes of compost to co-op farms.
					
					 Such works are carried on in all provinces and cities.
					
					 On Jan. 4-5 North Hwanghae Province trucked over 27,000 tonnes of manure to co-op farms while Kangwon and Jagang provinces sent loads of compost to farms.
					
					 People in North Hamgyong and North Phyongan provinces and cities have assisted farms with farming implements and materials as well as a large amount of compost. 
					
					 On January 10, the first Friday of this year, officials of ministries and national institutions went to co-op farm fields with large quantities of compost and farming materials to encourage the agricultural workers in making preparations for this year's farming.

articles.title: Motivational Campaign for Increased Production Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Motivational Campaign for Increased Production Brisk in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- A campaign for calling on the people to successfully carry out the tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address is gaining momentum in all parts of the DPRK.
					 Brass bands and loudspeaker cars are seen in industrial establishments, co-op farms and streets to inspire the people to make a fresh upsurge in industrial and agricultural output.
					
					 Artistic activities have been conducted to call for raising a fierce wind of making a fresh leap forward on all fronts of building a thriving country.
					
					 A number of art pieces which appeal to the people to implement the New Year Address have been created by the Ministry of Culture, the central committees of the Writers Union of Korea and the Artists Union of Korea.
					
					 Artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe, the National Theatrical Troupe and other art troupes find themselves among workers of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill and other factories to conduct artistic activities while working together with workers.
					
					 Art squads at various levels are also taking active part in giving appealing performances at the Pyongyang Railway Bureau, East Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant and other places.

articles.title: Sports Contests Scheduled in DPRK
articles.content:
Sports Contests Scheduled in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- A number of international and national sports contests will be held in the DPRK this year.
					 The international contests include the 23rd Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival marking the Day of the Shining Star in February and the IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon in April.
					
					 The domestic sports games are as follows:
					
					 Paektusan Prize sports contest in February
					
					 Mangyongdae Prize sports games in March-April
					
					 Sports contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize in May-June
					
					 Sports contest for Songun Torch Prize in June
					
					 Sports contest for Jonsung Cup in July
					
					 The DPRK championships in March and October-November
					
					 Osandok Prize sports contest in December
					
					 Youth championships in February, March and September-October
					
					 Junior championships in February and May-August
					
					 The 17th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize in June
					
					 The 2nd National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup in July-August
					
					 Cross-country relay in October
					
					 Indoor athletic championships in August
					
					 The 51st National Games of Juvenile Sports Schools in January and May-August
					
					 Besides, there will be technical renovation contest in all seasons, Hwaebul Cup soccer tournament in August, national contests of university sports teams in March and July, road relay in April and rally cycling in May.

articles.title: Outside Forces, Obstacle to Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Outside Forces, Obstacle to Korea's Reunification
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address called for rejecting outside forces in order to resolve the country's reunification issue in keeping with the aspiration and desire of fellow countrymen.
					 Outside forces remain a main hurdle in achieving the unity of the Korean nation and reunification of the country.
					
					 The Korean nation has suffered from the national division forced by outside forces for nearly 70 years. And it is vital for the Korean nation to reject outside forces.
					
					 The U.S. illegally occupied south Korea, prompted by a criminal scheme to make it a springboard for invasion of the whole territory of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. that unleashed a war against the DPRK in the 1950s has frequently staged air, ground and naval war exercises against the DPRK.
					
					 After working out war scenarios for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, it has been stepping up the moves to redeploy its aggression forces and relocate its military bases, part of its preparations to provoke the second Korean War.
					
					 The work for achieving reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south and the movement for independent reunification that had gained momentum after the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration have suffered turns and twists due to the U.S. obstructions.
					
					 It is the history-proven truth that the removal of danger of war and the country's reunification would be unthinkable without rejecting outside forces.
					
					 The driving force for national reunification is all the members of the Korean nation in the north, in the south and abroad and only when the Korean nation remain steadfast in the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself, will it be possible to the reunification issue.
					
					 All the Koreans should definitely reject the domination and interference of outside forces and actively strive to achieve the independent reunification under the uplifted banner of June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: New Posters Produced
articles.content:
New Posters Produced
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK produced new posters to call for waging a dynamic movement for national reunification.
					 Posters "Let us make a new advance in the movement for national reunification this year, true to the behests of the great leader and general!" and "Let us usher in a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity!" reflect the strong desire and resolution of the Korean people to glorify forever the undying exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in accomplishing the cause of national reunification and wage a dynamic movement for national reunification.
					
					 Posters "Let us respect and sincerely implement joint declarations from the firm stand of By Our Nation Itself!" and "Let us reject foreign forces and steadfastly preserve the stand of By Our Nation Itself!" show the firm will of Koreans to achieve national reunification without fail in line with the three principles of national reunification and north-south joint declarations.
					
					 Posters "Let us resolutely check and foil confrontation and war moves of bellicose forces at home and abroad!" and "Let's defend national security and peace!" represent the spirit of the Korean people to resolutely frustrate the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group to stifle the DPRK and bring earlier the independent reunification.

articles.title: Korean Schoolchildren Resident in Japan Join New Year Performance
articles.content:
Korean Schoolchildren Resident in Japan Join New Year Performance
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Korean schoolchildren residing in Japan joined the Schoolchildren's New Year performance held here, with the music and dance "We Will Follow Marshal Kim Jong Un Only".
					 The music and dance gave a glimpse of the bright future of the Korean schoolchildren in Japan who are firmly keeping their national identity in the alien land. 
					
					 What touched the heartstring of the audience was a narrative based on their ardent yearning for the homeland.
					
					 The main idea of their performance was that the homeland precisely means the loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Through the successful performance, they showed their steadfast will to remain loyal to Kim Jong Un, who is always paying deep attention to developing the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) as the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il did in their lifetime.
					
					 They highly praised the socialist homeland as the best in the world as it has been blessed with great leaders.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on All Koreans to Achieve National Unity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on All Koreans to Achieve National Unity
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Whoever loves the country and nation and cherishes its soul should neither turn his or her face away from great national unity nor ignore it. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an article.
					 It is not only the major task but the final goal of the cause of national reunification for all compatriots in the north and the south to put an end to the history of distrust and confrontation and get reconciled and unite, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The great national unity precisely means national reunification.
					
					 The idea of By Our Nation Itself is the most just one of national unity to be invariably upheld by all compatriots at home and abroad in their drive for independent reunification. The June 15 era of reunification has eloquently proved that when all compatriots uphold the banner of By Our Nation Itself, idea of the great national unity, they can smash any challenge and obstructions by anti-reunification forces and achieve national reunification without fail.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are the most just great programme of reunification common to the nation as they clarified the will to achieve the country's reunification independently by concerted efforts of Koreans.
					
					 In order to achieve national reunification, all compatriots should reject the foreign forces opposed to reunification and all Koreans desirous of reunification should pool their efforts. No force on earth can match the unbreakable unity and might of the Koreans with same blood and history when they unite close.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should wage a nationwide movement for reunification to adorn this as a year of victory which would bring about a fresh turning phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Washington's Wild Dream to Dominate World
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Washington's Wild Dream to Dominate World
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. announced that it would deploy a Global Hawk in Japan to tighten watch on the DPRK and other countries.
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. Senate passed a package bill on defense budget for fiscal 2014 involving the cost for setting up a high-performance radar system in Japan.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 The planned deployment clearly indicates that Washington has not yet rolled back its hostile policy toward the DPRK but has zealously pushed forward it to a reckless phase of implementation.
					
					 Lurking behind the projected deployment of an unmanned spy plane in Japan near the Korean peninsula is an ulterior design of Washington to realize its wild ambition for dominating the world at any cost by beefing up its military force in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The ruling quarters of the U.S. are concentrating huge forces of aggression in the Asia-Pacific region after mapping out a pivot-to-Asia-Pacific defense strategy.
					
					 The U.S. is scheming to make a justification for carrying out its strategy for aggression by escalating confrontation with the DPRK and rendering the situation extremely tense.
					
					 The U.S. has, in actuality, deployed nuclear strike means en masse in its mainland and Japan, on Guam and Hawaii, etc. It is now watching for a chance to ignite a war at any moment.
					
					 Many countries are expressing concerns over the acute situation in the Asia-Pacific region and the escalating tension in Northeast Asia, in particular, hoping for peace and security.
					
					 The U.S. wild ambition to dominate the world is an anachronistic wild dream swimming against the trend of the times.
					
					 Washington would be well advised to abandon its foolish attempt.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Fuller Play to Advantages of Korean-style Socialism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Fuller Play to Advantages of Korean-style Socialism
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses is the best social system as it provides a sure guarantee for the building of a highly civilized nation, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Socialism in the DPRK is the best social system as it enables all people to enjoy a highly civilized life and lead a worthwhile life and makes it possible to successfully carry out the gigantic tasks arising in the building of a highly civilized nation in the shortest possible period.
					
					 Our socialist motherland ensures that party, power and cultural bodies conduct their all activities for the wellbeing of the popular masses and material and cultural wealth of society is channeled into bringing a highly civilized life of all people.
					
					 The advantageous compulsory free education and healthcare systems for the people are fully displaying their vitality despite the manifold difficulties and trials caused by the imperialist reactionaries' moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 All fields of culture including education, healthcare, literature and arts, sports and morality serve the purpose of bringing up all people as comprehensively developed human beings with independent consciousness, a high level of cultural knowledge, strong physical bodies and noble moral traits.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea has unrolled a grand blueprint to reach the acme of the civilization in the 21st century at a go, not step by step.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will give fullest play to the advantages of socialism under the leadership of the party and set an example in building a highly civilized nation in the 21st century.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Rapid Boost in Electric Power, Coal Production
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Rapid Boost in Electric Power, Coal Production
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls for bringing about signal innovations on the fronts of electricity and coal which keep industry afloat and thus giving strong spurs to the general onward movement for this year.
					 To radically increase electric power and coal production is an urgent requirement for giving full play to the might and potential of Juche-based industry as required by the times and dynamically speeding up the drive for building an economic power and improving the people's living standard, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 Only when priority is given to the electric power and coal industries is it possible to make the fertilizer production system based on the gasification of coal successfully operate so that Juche fertilizer may be satisfactorily supplied to the agricultural front, a major thrust, and irrigate the fields of co-op farms so as to successfully attain the goal of grain production set by the party.
					
					 In order to usher in a fresh heyday in the construction by building world-class structures representative of the Songun era it is very important to produce and ensure quality building materials such as cement in good time by ensuring the supply of electric power and coal to the building material production bases in a responsible manner.
					
					 It is also necessary to remarkably increase electric power and coal production in a bid to satisfactorily ensure power and raw and other materials needed to iron and steel works, leading chemical industrial bases and many light industrial factories as well as to provide the people with affluent and highly civilized living conditions.
					
					 The editorial calls on the whole party and country and all people to turn out as one in the drive to decisively boost the electric power and coal production in hearty response to the far-reaching plan and noble intention of the party.

articles.title: South Koreans Call for Peace against War
articles.content:
South Koreans Call for Peace against War
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- South Korean people of all social standings are turning out in the actions for peace against war and for withdrawal of the U.S. forces, saying they can no more tolerate the reckless moves for a nuclear war by the bellicose forces.
					 The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty condemned the present regime for resorting to war moves threatening the people's life under the tense situation in which firing of a single bullet may lead to an all-out war and a nuclear war.
					
					 The South Jolla Provincial Solidarity for Progress and other civic and public organizations in the province said that the Korean Peninsula is now in hair-trigger crisis due to the ceaseless war drills by the U.S. and south Korea, adding that if a war breaks out again, the Korean nation will suffer nuclear disasters and calamities.
					
					 The Pusan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, the Pusan Women's Society, the Pusan Youth Association and other civic and public organizations warned that the bellicose forces should stop acting rashly, noting that those seeking to run away overseas before anyone in case a war breaks out are talking about "counteraction". 
					
					 The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Youth Solidarity and other organizations said it is impossible to achieve peace on the Korean Peninsula as long as there persists the U.S. policy for a nuclear war and there continue military exercises supporting it. 
					
					 The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy said gone are days never to return when the U.S. used to unilaterally threaten other countries with nuclear weapons, asserting that the U.S. troops should immediately go home from south Korea they are regarding as their own home.
					
					 The Media Headquarters and the Science Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration insisted that the danger of a war should be eradicated and the U.S. and south Korean authorities should discontinue the hostile words and deeds and war drills against the DPRK.
					
					 The People's Strength for Building New World, the Federation of University Students and other public organizations called for preventing a war and bringing earlier the day to live in a reunified country.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Rejects Puppet Regime's Attempt to Revive Dictatorship
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Rejects Puppet Regime's Attempt to Revive Dictatorship
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, south Korean internet newspaper, on January 10 released an article rejecting the attempt of the puppet regime to revive the relics dating back to the period of the fascist dictatorial regime.
					 The article recalled that the textbook which distorted history and justified dictatorship and sycophancy toward Japan was rejected by schools, and said that it is public judgment of the history distortion by the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Nevertheless, the Ministry of Education, Science and Technology cried out for "special inspection", revealing its attempt to suppress the schools which rejected the textbooks, and the "Saenuri Party" called for writing a "textbook authorized by state".
					
					 The "textbook authorized by state" is relics of the "yusin" dictatorial regime which was used to maintain power through tightened control of education.
					
					 The present regime conducted such a farce as the history textbook made by conservative scholars was rejected.
					
					 The end of the regime engrossed in a war against the people was miserable, it warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Urged to Step Down
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Urged to Step Down
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Workers of Pusan area affiliated to the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally at the plaza of Pusan City Office on Jan. 9.
					 Speakers accused the present chief executive of pursuing the policy of disregarding public voices.
					
					 The New Year press conference of the chief executive is no more than a declaration of war against the workers, they said, adding the "government" is enforcing privatization of public sectors.
					
					 They recalled that south Koreans rejected the distorted history textbooks to which the conservative ruling forces have long directed much effort. It served as an important occasion indicating the orientation of this year's struggle, they noted.
					
					 Saying that they can never live under the Park Geun Hye regime even a day, they called on workers of Pusan to actively join the general strike for forcing the present regime to step down, smashing the suppression of labor movement and checking the privatization.
					
					 At the end of the meeting its participants held a demonstration, chanting slogans criticizing the puppet authorities' unpopular rule.

articles.title: Victims to Spy-ring Case in Period of Yusin Dictatorship Declared Not Guilty in S. Korea
articles.content:
Victims to Spy-ring Case in Period of Yusin Dictatorship Declared Not Guilty in S. Korea
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Victims to the spy-ring case of Ullung Island fabricated in the period of "yusin" dictatorship in south Korea were declared not guilty, according to KBS of south Korea Saturday.
					 The case was cooked up by the then puppet Central Intelligence Agency on March 15, 1974, when it kicked up a smear campaign detaining the members of the North Kyongsang Provincial Committee of the Revolutionary Party for Reunification and its affiliated organizations and claiming it detected "a spy group of the north".
					
					 In this regard, the Agency arrested scores of workers, peasants, fishermen, teachers, clergymen and politicians on Ullung Island, in Seoul, Taegu, Pusan, rural areas of North Jolla Province and other places and sentenced at least 30 of them to death and heavy penalties.
					
					 The crimes in the period of "yusin" dictatorship can never be covered up no matter how much water may flow under the bridge as all sorts of smear campaigns were staged under various pretexts in the period for the purpose of maintaining the power. Criminals are sure to face punishment by the nation.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Urge S. Korean Chief Executive to Step Down
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Urge S. Korean Chief Executive to Step Down
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held a memorial service for south Korean citizen Ri Nam Jong, who committed self-immolation demanding the puppet chief executive step down, in Los Angeles on Jan. 3.
					 Its participants recalled that Ri burned himself to death while staging a protest, holding a placard reading "Park Geun Hye, step down", "Special investigation" in Seoul on Dec. 31 last year.
					
					 In his suicide notes he censured the puppet regime for staging fraudulent election and called for probing truth about it through a special investigation, appealing to all people to turn out in the struggle, they said.
					
					 They declared that the south Korean chief executive who took office through fraud and swindle should step down at once as demanded by the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Indian Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Indian Party Leader
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) expressed full support to the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					 At the meeting with the DPRK ambassador to India on Jan. 2, he said:
					
					 It is the great happiness and honor for all people of the DPRK to be led by Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the ideas and cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The popular traits of Kim Jong Un, who shows the people warm love and benevolence and devotes his all to them are deeply moving the progressive people of the world and drawing attention of the international community. 
					
					 Under his tested leadership the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the people of the DPRK resolutely frustrated the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and forces following it and achieved a great victory last year. 
					
					 The Korean people have achieved great successes in the efforts for building an economic power and improving the people's living standard. 
					
					 We fully support the WPK for having removed the factionists in the party and firmly ensured the organizational and ideological purity of the party.
					
					 We are sure that the tasks set forth in the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un will be successfully implemented under his wise and energetic leadership. 
					
					 The WPK and the people of the DPRK will build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the country while meeting all challenges of the enemies as they are led by Kim Jong Un with outstanding idea and theory, distinguished leadership ability and extraordinary military wisdom. 
					
					 The Communist Party of India (Marxist) will always support the struggle of the WPK and the people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Foreign Media Report Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
Foreign Media Report Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un was reported in different countries from January 1 to 8. 
					 Foreign media specially edited the main contents of the New Year Address with photos documenting his revolutionary activities. They included the Lao newspaper Congtap Pasason Lao, Mongolian News Agency Montsame, Iranian newspaper Iran News, Myanmar paper The New Age, Thai papers Thairath, Daily News and The Nation, Angolan paper Journal de Angola, DR Congo paper L'Avenir, Egyptian paper Al Ahram, Russian internet TV Krasnoye Televiseniye and websites of the Tynda Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia and the Poland branch of the Korean Friendship Association. 
					
					 The Chinese Dandong Daily, Bangladeshi papers Bangla Times and Blits, Indian paper Indian and World Event, Pakistani paper Baluchistan Times, Myanmar News, Libyan paper February, Zambian paper Post and websites of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il and the Romanian Workers' Association carried the full text or gist of the New Year Address under the titles such as "Leader Kim Jong Un set forth tasks for 2014".

articles.title: DPRK's Important Anniversary Observed by Lao, Indonesian Papers
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Anniversary Observed by Lao, Indonesian Papers
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Lao and Indonesian papers carried special write-ups between December 30 last year and January 5 this year on the occasion of the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					 The Lao paper Congtap Pasason Lao carried an article titled "Kim Jong Un, outstanding leader of creation and construction" illustrated with his photo. 
					
					 The paper said that he gave on-the-spot guidance to many units in 2013 to encourage all the service personnel and people of the DPRK to work new miracles, ushering in a heyday of construction in the DPRK. 
					
					 Monumental buildings produced by his deep love for the people will shine, the paper noted. 
					
					 The Lao paper Heng Ngan carried an article illustrated with his photo. The article said that a heyday of construction was opened in the DPRK last year thanks to his energetic leadership and patriotic devotion of the army and people. 
					
					 The Indonesian paper Suara Karya carried an article titled "Traits of popular leader" which said:
					
					 H.E. Kim Jong Un of the DPRK is warmly loved by the people. 
					
					 He takes care of the service personnel and people with paternal affection. 
					
					 The DPRK has achieved great successes in the efforts for improving the people's living standard under the leadership of Kim Jong Un devoting his all to the people. 
					
					 The people's laughing is heard across the country. 
					
					 That is why the Korean people absolutely trust and follow Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kanji Inoki y su comitiva rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Assistance to Farms Brisk in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- A brisk campaign for assistance to the countryside is going on in the DPRK in hearty response to supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address, which called for keeping up agriculture as a major thrust of this year's struggle and concentrating all efforts on farming.
					 Pyongyang City recently provided more than 10,000 tonnes of compost to co-op farms.
					
					 Such works are carried on in all provinces and cities.
					
					 On Jan. 4-5 North Hwanghae Province trucked over 27,000 tonnes of manure to co-op farms while Kangwon and Jagang provinces sent loads of compost to farms.
					
					 People in North Hamgyong and North Phyongan provinces and cities have assisted farms with farming implements and materials as well as a large amount of compost. 
					
					 On January 10, the first Friday of this year, officials of ministries and national institutions went to co-op farm fields with large quantities of compost and farming materials to encourage the agricultural workers in making preparations for this year's farming.

articles.title: Continuan mitines en granjas, fabricas y empresas en apoyo al mensaje de Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Continuan mitines en granjas, fabricas y empresas en apoyo al mensaje de Ano Nuevo
						
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- Continuan en distintas localidades mitines de los granjeros y los empleados de los organos, fabricas y empresas para materializar estrictamente las tareas programaticas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el mensaje de Ano Nuevo.
					En las ocasiones hubo informes e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que el mensaje del Ano Nuevo sirve de bandera estimulante que infunde a todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo la conviccion y la dignidad revolucionaria en el radiante futuro de Corea de Sol y de guia programatica que ilumina el atajo de nuevo salto e innovaciones.
					
					Expresaron determinacion de registrar innovaciones en la produccion agricola en pleno acato al noble proposito del partido de tomar la agricultura como la mayor prioridad.
					
					Refirieron que desarrollaran la ganaderia y cultivaran muchos hongos para suministrar al pueblo mucho mas carnes, verduras y hongos.
					
					Senalaron la necesidad de acelerar la obra al concentrar las manos de obra y los medios en la construccion de la marisma de Honggondo y poner de pleno funcionamiento las instalaciones de transporte y compresor.
					
					Enfatizaron que bajo las llamaradas de la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo, convertiran la economia del pais en la economia moderna basada en la tecnologia CNC y centrada en las ciencias y tecnologias y abriran el atajo de la epoca de la economia centrada en la intelectualidad, al concentrar las fuerzas en el desarrollo de la tecnologia de punta y las ramas de ciencias basicas.

articles.title: Competencias deportivas nacionales e internacionales para el 103 (2014) de la Era Juche
articles.content:
Competencias deportivas nacionales e internacionales para el 103 (2014) de la Era Juche
						
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- Este ano tendran lugar en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea muchas competencias deportivas nacionales e internacionales. 
					Entre los juegos internacionales figuran el 23o Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico sobre el Hielo por el Premio Paektusan para celebrar el Dia de la Estrella Luz (febrero) y el 27o Torneo Internacional de Maraton para el Premio Mangyongdae como evento concurrente de la Federacion Internacional de Atletas Amateurs (FIAA) (abril).
					
					Como torneos nacionales se efectuaran la Competencia Deportiva por el Premio Paektusan (febrero), el Torneo Deportivo por el Premio Mangyongdae (marzo-abril), la Competencia Deportiva por la Copa Antorcha de Pochonbo (mayo-junio), la por la Copa Antorcha de Songun (junio), la por la Copa Jonsung (julio), el Campeonato Nacional (marzo, octubre-noviembre), la Competencia Deportiva por el Premio Osandok (diciembre), el Campeonato de Jovenes (febrero, marzo, septiembre-octubre), el Campeonato de Juniores (febrero, mayo-agosto), el 17o Campeonato Nacional de Taekwondo por el Premio Jongilbong (junio), la segunda Competencia Nacional de Fuertes Taekwondocas por la Copa Jonsung (julio-agosto), la Competencia de Carrera de Relevo por montanas y llanuras (octubre), el Campeonato de Atletismo bajo Techo (agosto) y la 51a Competencia Deportiva Nacional de las Escuelas Deportivas de Jovenes y Ninos (enero, mayo-agosto).
					
					Tambien se desarrollaran la competencia de renovacion tecnica (durante el ano en curso), la Competencia de Futbol por la Copa Hwaebul (agosto), la Competencia Nacional de Equipos Deportivos Universitarios (marzo y julio), la Competencia de Carrera de Relevos (abril), la competencia de ciclismo de varios dias (mayo), etc.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia disparate de Abe
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia disparate de Abe
						
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el premier japones Abe, al publicar opiniones en primeros dias del ano nuevo, dijo que desde ahora  comienza la lucha por recuperar "Japon poderoso", razon por la cual es preciso profundizar mas la discusion nacional para la enmienda de la constitucion necesaria al cambio de la epoca.
					Esto es el peligroso disparate que revela la naturaleza del maniaco militarista.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido el dia 12 y continua:
					
					Antes, tambien Abe expuso su voluntad de recuperar "Japon poderoso".
					
					Desde los primeros dias de su mandato, el peroro que se debe divulgar altamente "Kimigayo", simbolo del militarismo y primer paso para recuperar "Japon poderoso", lo que significa hacer el resucitado pais militarista.
					
					Esta vez, Abe declaro su voluntad de iniciar la enmienda de la "constitucion pacifica" para llevarlo a cabo.
					
					Esto, en su esencia, significa recuperar el tiempo en que agredio en el siglo pasado a los paises asiaticos gritando la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental".
					
					Abe puso al desnudo la naturaleza de su pais como Estado de guerra mudando la piel de "Estado pacifico" y publico oficialmente al mundo su voluntad de realizar a toda costa la ambicion de militarizacion y reagresion.
					
					El desafio abiertamente a los pueblos asiaticos y los demas del mundo que desean la paz.
					
					El pais isleno toma el camino de la militarizacion que trae solo su autodestruccion.
					
					Si las fuerzas en el poder actual de Japon tienen, aunque sea minimo, el pensamiento racional, deben ver correctamente la realidad y actuar con prudencia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela intento de EE.UU. de ubicar Global Hawk en Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela intento de EE.UU. de ubicar Global Hawk en Japon
						
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos anuncio que ubicara en Japon el avion sin piloto Global Hawk para intensificar la vigilancia sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y otros paises. 
					Por otra parte, el senado del congreso norteamericano aprobo el proyecto de ley de defensa para el ano fiscal 2014 que incluye los gastos para el emplazamiento de radar de alta potencia en Japon. 
					
					Esto evidencia que es invariable la politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC sino se promueve en etapa practica. 
					
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este lunes y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU. intenta trasladar el avion sin piloto a Japon que se encuentra cerca de la Peninsula Coreana con el astuto objetivo de consolidar sus fuerzas militares en la region de Asia-Pacifico y lograr sin falta su ambicion de hegemonia mundial. 
					
					Los gobernantes norteamericanos presentaron la estrategia de defensa nacional dando importancia a la region de Asia-Pacifico y concentran en ella enormes fuerzas armadas agresoras. 
					
					EE.UU. pretende preparar el pretexto para realizar su estrategia agresiva creando la situacion ultratensa mediante la agravacion del enfrentamiento con la RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. ya emplazo en su territorio principal, la isla Guam, Hawai, Japon y otras zonas enormes medios de ataque nuclear acechando la oportunidad de provocar la guerra de agresion en cualquier momento. 
					
					Ahora muchos paises se preocupan por la situacion cada dia mas agravante de la region de Asia-Pacifico, en particular, el Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					EE.UU. debe abandonar su anacronica y vana ilusion de hegemonia mundial opuesta a la tendencia general.
